name: speterlin-stocks
summary: A Python package for a suite of quant-trading opportunities in stocks with API integration: Alpaca brokerage for storing USD assets and margin trading (2x) on exchanges NYSE & NASDAQ, Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) & Google Trends & Yahoo Finance & Google Finance & ExchangeRate & MarketBeat & CrunchBase for data collection, OpenAI & Google Gemini-Pro for AI analysis.
